description: Winamp includes a Q1 named Winamp.q1 file that contains several EQ presets. Examples include Classic, Club, Dance, Pop, Rock, etc. When you create a custom preset, it is added to the list of presets saved in the default Q1 file.

You can save custom EQ settings by selecting Options → Equalizer → Save Preset → Preset... from the Winamp menu bar. You can load a specific EQ preset from a Q1 file by selecting Options → Equalizer → Load Preset → Preset... .
The default location of the Q1 file is: C:\​Users\​Administrator\​AppData\​Roaming\​Winamp

common_filenames.description: Winamp.q1 - The default EQ presets file used by Winamp.
